abstract: When Google Health was introduced in 2008, Marissa Mayer, a Google executive, said it would be a “large ongoing initiative” that the company hoped would attract millions of regular users.
snippet: When Google Health was introduced in 2008, Marissa Mayer, a Google executive, said it would be a “large ongoing initiative” that the company hoped would attract millions of regular users.
lead_paragraph: Google is giving up on its vision of helping people live healthier lives with online personal health records.

headline.main: Google to End Health Records Service After It Fails to Attract Users
headline.print_headline: Google to End Health Records Service After It Fails to Attract Users
